message: Let's split it 60/40. It's a fair starting point, don't you think?
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is a good starting point.  It's a fair trade since I'm taking the risk of this offer being rejected, and you'll lose 20% of your share if we move to the next round.
I'm willing to go 50/50 this time. Let's just split it evenly and move on.
